title: linea_nigra
body:
A [i]linea nigra[/i] (Latin for "black line"), is an area of hyperpigmentation (darkening of skin) that runs down the abdomen in the form of a thin line, seen during pregnancy. It occurs due to increased levels of melanocyte-stimulating hormone, which is also responsible for the [[dark_nipples|darkening of nipples]] in pregnant women.

h4. See also:

* [[dark nipples]]

title: kochiya_sanae
body:
The "Human of the Worshipped Wind". Stage 5 boss of [[Touhou]]'s [[Mountain of Faith]] and later a recurring playable character. Has the power to create miracles.

She is the miko of the [[Moriya Shrine]] under the patronage of [[Yasaka Kanako]] and also direct descendant of the shrine's original deity, [[Moriya Suwako]]. Sanae and her deities moved into [[Gensokyo]] due to waning faith of humans from the outside world, making her one of the only humans from the 21st century. Recent games in the main series as well as certain side works consider her a type of deity in her own right.

She has [[long hair|long]] [[green hair]], with a [[single sidelock]]. Her eyes are [[green eyes|green]] or [[blue eyes|blue]]. In her hair are [[snake hair ornament|snake]] and [[frog hair ornament]]s and a [[single hair tube]]. She is frequently depicted with [[large breasts]]. She wears a [[nontraditional miko]] outfit consisting of a [[sleeveless shirt|sleeveless]] [[collared shirt|collared]] [[white shirt]] with [[detached sleeves|detached]] [[white sleeves]], a [[long skirt|long]] [[frilled skirt|frilled]] [[blue skirt]], [[white socks]], and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[shoes]], her signature [[gohei]] is different from the norm as it has straight paper decorations. As of [[Unfinished Dream of All Living Ghost]], she is additionally shown with [[wings]]. Doujins sometimes portray her wearing a modern [[school uniform]] as homage to her origins.

She is a generally good, if somewhat naive and clumsy, girl, but also an "overeager youkai hunter":/pool/show/4639 (leading to her portrayal of frequently bullying [[Tatara Kogasa]] after a scene in [[Undefined Fantastic Object]] where Sanae gave scathing words against the latter).

She is occasionally depicted as a [[retro games sanae (meme)|generation behind]] due to [[Mountain of Faith]] first releasing in 2007.

She is sometimes called "[[player_2|2P]] [[Hakurei Reimu|Reimu]]" or "[[Miko]] [[Luigi]]" due to Reimu's red outfit compared to Sanae's green outfit.

h4. Example
* !post #8091655: Usual Appearance
* !post #6586874: [[Unfinished Dream of All Living Ghost]]
h4. See also

* [[Retro games Sanae (meme)|]]
* Pool #4639 - For depictions of Sanae in her Youkai Extermination Mode

h4. External links

* "Touhou Wiki: Sanae Kochiya":https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Sanae_Kochiya

title: oozora_subaru_(loungewear)
body:
The 7th [[official alternate costume|costume]] of [[hololive]]'s [[Oozora Subaru]].

It is [[loungewear]], consisting of an [[animal hood|duck-themed]] [[multicolored jacket|multicolored]] (mostly [[white jacket|white]] and [[yellow jacket|yellow)]] [[hooded jacket]], a [[short sleeves|short-sleeved]] [[cropped shirt|cropped]] [[yellow shirt]] with an [[orange bra]] [[bra peek|peeking out]], [[white bloomers|white]] [[polka dot bloomers]], [[loose socks|loose]] [[black socks|black]] [[striped socks]], and [[duck slippers|duck-themed]] [[animal slippers]].

She has 2 different [[official alternate hairstyle|official hairstyles]] in this costume
* [[Short hair]] done in a [[two side up]] with a duck-themed [[yellow hairband]]
* [[Long hair]] from her [[oozora subaru (starlight)|3D 4th anniversary]] model

title: minor_arcana_(tarot)
body: The Minor Arcana, sometimes known as the Lesser Arcana, are the suit cards in a cartomantic [[tarot]] deck. The typical suits will be Wands (Batons), Swords, Cups, and Pentacles (Coins), but many artists will create custom suits that fit their world building. There are typically 14 cards in each suit, numbered Ace through Ten, and then Page, Knight, Queen, and King, similar to a [[playing_card|poker]] deck.

title: pingu
body: Pingu is a character from the animated children's television series baring [[pingu (series)|his name]]. He is an anthropomorphic [[emperor penguin]] and he lives in the South Pole with his family.

title: keisanchuu_new_costume
body:
The [[costume]] worn by the members of [[22/7]] on the TV show [i]22/7 Keisan Chuu[/i]. It is referred to as the new costume ([i]新衣装[/i]), as it replaced the [[Rokubanchou school uniform]] they wore previously.

It consists of a [[white shirt|white]] [[long sleeves|long-sleeved]] [[shirt]], a [[black dress|black]] [[double-breasted]] [[pleated dress|pleated]] [[pinafore dress]], a [[white ribbon|white]] [[neck ribbon]], a [[black belt]], [[black socks|black]] [[kneehighs]] (or [[black pantyhose]]), and [[black footwear|black]] [[loafers]]. An [[emblem]] of 22/7 is sewn onto the left shoulder of the shirt.

h4. Examples
* !post #8332951

title: angry_marines
body:
Space Marine chapter in the Warhammer 40,000 Universe that was orginally created on 4chan. Has only the most irritated, insane, mad, generally angry Space Marines who can't be assigned to any other chapter due to their disregard for chain of command, general profanity and irritablity. Tend to carry out suicidal assaults - and win nonetheless.

Are generally led by Commissar Fuklaw, Egar, or any other equivalent of a pissed off Imperial Commissar.

Marines in this chapter also have anger-related names, often spelled backwards for humourous (?) effect. Examples include Ragequit, Muchdickery, Getoffmylawn, Dissep, Bitch Sodomiser of Death (BSOD), etc.

Normally also are recognized by their chant - "ALWAYS ANGRY! ALL THE TIME!"

Are also notorious for having Powerfeet and Powerfists - the Fists to smash the enemy's face in, the Feet to curbstomp and kick in the enemy's balls.
Random Imperial Guardsman -"Commissar, who are they?"
Random Commissar (in awe) - "They…are the Angry Marines. And they shall know no calm."
Angry Marine Sarge - "GOT THAT MUCH RIGHT, FUCKERS! WE'RE HERE TO CLEAN UP YOUR SHITTY OP! NOW GET THE FUCK OUT AND LET US WORK, YOU CUNTS!"

title: penguin
body:
A type of flightless aquatic [[bird]] with upright posture and black-and-white plumage. 

Almost all penguin species are native to the Southern Hemisphere, and while they are famous for living in the frozen Antarctic, several live in temperate zones and a few are found in Africa or the equatorial Galapagos island chain.

h4. Examples

* 11. [[Macaroni penguin]]

Many dakimakura are two-sided, showing single character clothed on one side and [[nude]] (or less clothed) on the other. These dakimakura should be tagged [[multiple views]] and not [[solo]] nor [[double_dakimakura_(medium)]].

body:
